Package org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.activity.config

A set of helper classes to aid in defining how Activities are configured.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityInputPortDefinitionBean
    A bean that describes properties of an Input port.
    ActivityOutputPortDefinitionBean
    A bean that describes properties of an Output port.
    ActivityPortDefinitionBean
    A generic bean that describes the shared properties of input and output ports.
    ActivityPortsDefinitionBean
    Defines a configuration type that relates directly to an Activity and in particular defines details its input and output ports.
    An Activity that has its ports implicitly defined may define a ConfigType that extends this class, but this is not enforced.

Package org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.activity.config Description

A set of helper classes to aid in defining how Activities are configured. An Activity class is associated with a ConfigurationType, which is an arbitrary Java object defining how the Activity should be configured.
This package provides classes and interfaces that help in creating these ConfigurationTypes with details that are common across different Activities, but there use is in no way enforced.
